data.title: All text aligned to center, how to change it back to left aligned
data.meta_description: I don’t recall how I changed text align to center, then after that all my text are always showing center-aligned. No matter how I used edit function to set new alignment, it would not work. Please kindly help to solve th…
data.text:
It is usually centred, I think. You can check the manual. If you wish your text (Front and Back) left-aligned, then you will have to change the HTML used to display the card. It is not difficult, if you have never done this before, but do make a back-up first. Select the deck in Anki on your computer. Select one of the cards in the displayed list. Usually the first is automatically selected. Click the button Cards… . You will see a field, most likely {{Front}} in the large text box (panel) on the left. Insert a line before it with the following HTML.
Then on the line below {{Front}} , put the following HTML.
